name: Boomerang Boy (DogoBweadz)
description:
Boomerang Boy is a puzzle game where you use your boomerang to solve short level puzzles.

Content added:

Tutorial level
WIP Menu

Content that will be added:

3 worlds (10 levels per world)
More boomerang types
Enemies 
Music
Sound effects
Actual art
Costumes


I plan to release this game on both apple and android. I'm really young, only 14 but I really like this project and would like to finish it!
